name: Avoid the Squares
description:
Control a small but nimble square as you dodge the gray squares coming from every direction.

- Endless survival challenge

- Easy to play, challenging to master

- Compete with friends on leaderboards

- Unlock new squares with coins collected in-game

- Clean, minimalistic style

- No in-app purchases

See how long you can last against the gray squares!

Either download the game for one of the many supported platforms, or play Avoid the Squares directly in browser!

For more, visit our website.
